Created an attachment (id=34411)
Report file on which error occurs

As requested by Gary Xue

I have tested that connection can be successfully released for Oracle database. I think the problem is related with your own environment, not caused by BIRT. If you still get this bug in another environment, please give me the version information of BIRT, Oracle database, Oracle JDBC driver.

To avoid potential issues, I add a line code to check whether connection is closed before attempting to do it.
Plus in which operation you find such an error log. Thanks.
